title: Propagandist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Smear. The next time a Smeared player is investigated, they will appear suspicious.
- At night, choose a player to Glorify and choose any role. The next time a Glorified player is investigated, they will appear as that role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players lose Smeared and Glorified after being investigated.
- Smeared players appear to have attacked a player tonight, and also appear as the Propagandist.
- Glorified players do not appear to have attacked a player and have astral visits.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

*We represent the good of the common people. For your safety and ours, let us do our job.*
